I want to have sex with the Demon King."},{"lineNumber":263396,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが無理矢理は不可能","translatedEnglishLine":"But forcing her is work."},{"lineNumber":263398,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんどかやったが、うまくいかなかった（過去回想ぽく入れるか）","translatedEnglishLine":"I've tried several times but it didn’t go well (perhaps insert as a flashback)."},{"lineNumber":263399,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎のようなアホが何故いいのか分からない","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t understand why someone foolish like Kentarou is good for her."},{"lineNumber":263400,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":263401,"originalJapaneseLine":"側でジュースを飲んでいるワーグ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Warg is drinking juice nearby."},{"lineNumber":263402,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの貪欲さにあきれる、エッチの為ならどんな努力もするのね","translatedEnglishLine":"He is exasperated at Rance’s greediness—he’ll do any effort just for sex."},{"lineNumber":263403,"originalJapaneseLine":"当たり前だ、土下座でやれるのならしてやるぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course, if I have to grovel on my knees, I’ll do it."},{"lineNumber":263404,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎君と美樹ちゃんは、思い出、絆、そういう深い物なので無理よ","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentarou-kun and Miki-chan have memories, bonds, something deep like that, so it’s impossible."},{"lineNumber":263405,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうね、ランスがその頃から美樹と出会っていたら恋仲になったかも","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s right, if Rance had met Miki back then, they might have become lovers."},{"lineNumber":263406,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・そういや、ワーグ　お前は夢を見せる事が出来るんだよな。","translatedEnglishLine":"...By the way, Warg, you can show dreams, right?"},{"lineNumber":263407,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹の記憶のシーンに俺を介入させる事は出来るか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Can you let me intervene in Miki’s memory scenes?"},{"lineNumber":263408,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだ、あの子の過去の思い出、健太郎がいた場所に俺が入ればいいんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, if I enter the place in her past memories where Kentarou was."},{"lineNumber":263409,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・少し考える、出来るかも、でも他人の記憶にリンクするので危険かも","translatedEnglishLine":"...Thinking it over, maybe possible, but linking to another person's memory might be dangerous."},{"lineNumber":263410,"originalJapaneseLine":"それにいいの魔王といっても知り合いの子の記憶を書き換える事になるよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, even though you’re the Demon King, rewriting the memories of someone you know is another matter."},{"lineNumber":263411,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":263412,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　手段は選ばない","translatedEnglishLine":"> I won’t choose the means."},{"lineNumber":263413,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tまずは健太郎君に関する美樹を記憶を見るわね・・","translatedEnglishLine":"First, I will view Miki’s memories about Rance and Warg watch from the two’s meeting"},{"lineNumber":263415,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t今にいたるまでの出来事を美樹の記憶視点から覗いた","translatedEnglishLine":"up to the present events from Miki’s memory perspective."},{"lineNumber":263416,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t・・・健太郎君、とってもいい子じゃない。悪人じゃないわ、一途で素敵","translatedEnglishLine":"...Kentarou-kun is a really good guy. Not a bad person, earnest and wonderful."},{"lineNumber":263417,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t異世界（ランスからは）での生活、健太郎とは幼なじみ・・仲良し","translatedEnglishLine":"Life in another world (from Rance’s view), Kentarou is his childhood friend... close friends."},{"lineNumber":263418,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tだが、ある日、異世界（私達の世界に）に掠われた。","translatedEnglishLine":"But one day, she was taken to another world (our world)."},{"lineNumber":263419,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔王になれて脅迫された怖かった美樹・・そして噛まれて魔王の血を入れられた","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki was scared, forced to become Demon King and threatened... then bitten and infused with Demon King’s blood."},{"lineNumber":263420,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t自分が徐々に変わっていく恐怖・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The fear of gradually changing herself..."},{"lineNumber":263421,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそこに健太郎が助けに来てくれた、うれしかった","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Kentarou came to help, which made her happy."},{"lineNumber":263422,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t美樹の記憶なので健太郎の活躍は描かれていない","translatedEnglishLine":"Because these are Miki’s memories, Kentarou’s efforts aren’t detailed."},{"lineNumber":263423,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔王ガイを倒し、美樹を助けにきた所だけ","translatedEnglishLine":"Only the part where he defeated Demon King Gai and came to rescue Miki."},{"lineNumber":263424,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの事については、ワードとランスの会話で表現","translatedEnglishLine":"This is expressed through the conversation between Warg and Rance."},{"lineNumber":263425,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t健太郎は楽した訳では無いんじゃない、知らないけど・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentarou probably didn’t have it easy, I don’t know for sure though..."},{"lineNumber":263426,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t異世界から来て、苦労して、日光さんと出会って、いくつの試練を越えて","translatedEnglishLine":"He came from another world, endured hardships, met Hikaru-san, and overcame many trials."},{"lineNumber":263427,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこうして魔王ガイを倒したの、ランスよりすごいんじゃないとか","translatedEnglishLine":"And thus defeated Demon King Gai—maybe even more impressive than Rance."},{"lineNumber":263428,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの後も二人の物語は続いた","translatedEnglishLine":"After this, their story continued."},{"lineNumber":263429,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔王になりかけ、再び囚われる美樹を取り戻す健太郎","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentarou retrieving Miki just as she was about to become the Demon King and was captured again."},{"lineNumber":263430,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tうーん、アホな奴と思っていたが、なかなかやるじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, I thought he was an idiot, but he’s actually quite capable."},{"lineNumber":263431,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tしかし、これだけ一緒にいて美樹ちゃんに手を出してないなんて、そこはアホだな","translatedEnglishLine":"However, the fact that he hasn’t made a move on Miki-chan despite being this close—that part is dumb."},{"lineNumber":263432,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tよし、では、記憶書換だ。今の健太郎のシーン、全部俺様にしろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, then rewrite the memories. Change all the scenes with Kentarou to me."},{"lineNumber":263433,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t今の感動的な記憶見て、よくそんな事言えるわね・・とワーグ","translatedEnglishLine":"Warg says, 'After seeing those touching memories, you can say that...'"},{"lineNumber":263434,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tでも、やってくれる・・","translatedEnglishLine":"But he’ll do it..."},{"lineNumber":263435,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tビジュアルの、健太郎がランスに書き換わる","translatedEnglishLine":"In the visuals, Kentarou is rewritten as Rance."},{"lineNumber":263436,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t過去シーンの一部、４．５台詞だけ再生。健太郎でなくランスが語り","translatedEnglishLine":"Playback of a part of a past scene with about 4-5 lines. Rance speaks instead of Kentarou."},{"lineNumber":263437,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t美樹がランス君と返事している感じの所を","translatedEnglishLine":"At the part where Miki responds to Rance-kun."},{"lineNumber":263438,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tで・・フェードアウト","translatedEnglishLine":"Then... fade out."},{"lineNumber":263439,"originalJapaneseLine":"目が覚める・・美樹のランスを見る目が違う","translatedEnglishLine":"She wakes up... Miki’s eyes when looking at Rance have changed."},{"lineNumber":263440,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス君と甘えた感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"She is affectionate toward Rance-kun."},{"lineNumber":263441,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに健太郎が現れる、どうしたの美樹ちゃん、そろそろ夕食の時間だよ、いこ","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Kentarou appears. 'What’s wrong, Miki-chan? It’s almost dinner time, let’s go.'"},{ "lineNumber":263442, "originalJapaneseLine":"だれ、あなた、知らないと健太郎に向かって言う、ショックを受ける健太郎", "translatedEnglishLine":"Miki says to Kentarou, 'Who are you? I don’t know you.' Kentarou is shocked."},{ "lineNumber":263443, "originalJapaneseLine":"　", "translatedEnglishLine":""},{ "lineNumber":263444, "originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが美樹を部屋に連れて行く", "translatedEnglishLine":"Rance takes Miki to his room."},{ "lineNumber":263445, "originalJapaneseLine":"そして抱きしめる、えっ・・どうしたの、あわあわと慌てる美樹", "translatedEnglishLine":"Then he hugs her. 'Eh... what’s wrong?' Miki flusters and panics."},{ "lineNumber":263446, "originalJapaneseLine":"今日、ぼくたちは結ばれよう。", "translatedEnglishLine":"Today, we shall be united."},{ "lineNumber":263447, "originalJapaneseLine":"でも、でも、それは元の世界に戻って、そうじゃなくて、二十歳になって結婚してからじゃないと・・", "translatedEnglishLine":"B-but, that should be after we return to the original world, or rather, after I turn twenty and marry..."},{ "lineNumber":263448, "originalJapaneseLine":"　美樹は若干矛盾に混乱します、あれ・・ランス君は魔人になったのでは？とか", "translatedEnglishLine":"Miki is somewhat confused by the contradiction, thinking, 'Wait... didn’t Rance-kun become a demon?'"},{ "lineNumber":263449, "originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス君、彼女・・いっぱいいる？　王様なの、あれあれ・・", "translatedEnglishLine":"Does Rance-kun have a lot of girlfriends? He’s a king, isn’t he...?"},{ "lineNumber":263450, "originalJapaneseLine":"うまくいいくるめで抱きます。", "translatedEnglishLine":"He manages to talk her into it and embraces her."},{ "lineNumber":263451,"originalJapaneseLine":"場所：ランスの部屋","translatedEnglishLine":"Location: Rance’s room"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞アイテム　剣を取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Item: Take the sword

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎と美樹がらぶらぶ歩いているシーンを見かける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He sees a scene where Kentarou and Miki are walking lovey-dovey.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見てランス君
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing that, Rance-kun thinks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹とどうしてもやりたい。魔王とエッチしたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I absolutely want to be with Miki. I want to have sex with the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが無理矢理は不可能
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But forcing her is impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の惚れ惚れテクニックを使っても無理
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even using my charming techniques won't work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんどかやったが、うまくいかなかった（過去回想ぽく入れるか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've tried several times but it didn’t go well (perhaps insert as a flashback).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎のようなアホが何故いいのか分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t understand why someone foolish like Kentarou is good for her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 側でジュースを飲んでいるワーグ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Warg is drinking juice nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの貪欲さにあきれる、エッチの為ならどんな努力もするのね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is exasperated at Rance’s greediness—he’ll do any effort just for sex.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当たり前だ、土下座でやれるのならしてやるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, if I have to grovel on my knees, I’ll do it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎君と美樹ちゃんは、思い出、絆、そういう深い物なので無理よ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentarou-kun and Miki-chan have memories, bonds, something deep like that, so it’s impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうね、ランスがその頃から美樹と出会っていたら恋仲になったかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s right, if Rance had met Miki back then, they might have become lovers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・そういや、ワーグ　お前は夢を見せる事が出来るんだよな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...By the way, Warg, you can show dreams, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の記憶のシーンに俺を介入させる事は出来るか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can you let me intervene in Miki’s memory scenes?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、あの子の過去の思い出、健太郎がいた場所に俺が入ればいいんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, if I enter the place in her past memories where Kentarou was.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・少し考える、出来るかも、でも他人の記憶にリンクするので危険かも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Thinking it over, maybe possible, but linking to another person's memory might be dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにいいの魔王といっても知り合いの子の記憶を書き換える事になるよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, even though you’re the Demon King, rewriting the memories of someone you know is another matter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　手段は選ばない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > I won’t choose the means.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずは健太郎君に関する美樹を記憶を見るわね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First, I will view Miki’s memories about Kentarou-kun...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間にして３０分ほど・・ランスとワーグは二人の出会いから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 30 minutes in time... Rance and Warg watch from the two’s meeting

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今にいたるまでの出来事を美樹の記憶視点から覗いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: up to the present events from Miki’s memory perspective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・健太郎君、とってもいい子じゃない。悪人じゃないわ、一途で素敵
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Kentarou-kun is a really good guy. Not a bad person, earnest and wonderful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異世界（ランスからは）での生活、健太郎とは幼なじみ・・仲良し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Life in another world (from Rance’s view), Kentarou is his childhood friend... close friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ある日、異世界（私達の世界に）に掠われた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But one day, she was taken to another world (our world).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王になれて脅迫された怖かった美樹・・そして噛まれて魔王の血を入れられた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki was scared, forced to become Demon King and threatened... then bitten and infused with Demon King’s blood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分が徐々に変わっていく恐怖・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fear of gradually changing herself...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに健太郎が助けに来てくれた、うれしかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Kentarou came to help, which made her happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の記憶なので健太郎の活躍は描かれていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because these are Miki’s memories, Kentarou’s efforts aren’t detailed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ガイを倒し、美樹を助けにきた所だけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only the part where he defeated Demon King Gai and came to rescue Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この事については、ワードとランスの会話で表現
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is expressed through the conversation between Warg and Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎は楽した訳では無いんじゃない、知らないけど・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentarou probably didn’t have it easy, I don’t know for sure though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異世界から来て、苦労して、日光さんと出会って、いくつの試練を越えて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He came from another world, endured hardships, met Hikaru-san, and overcame many trials.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして魔王ガイを倒したの、ランスよりすごいんじゃないとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And thus defeated Demon King Gai—maybe even more impressive than Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この後も二人の物語は続いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After this, their story continued.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王になりかけ、再び囚われる美樹を取り戻す健太郎
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentarou retrieving Miki just as she was about to become the Demon King and was captured again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、アホな奴と思っていたが、なかなかやるじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I thought he was an idiot, but he’s actually quite capable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、これだけ一緒にいて美樹ちゃんに手を出してないなんて、そこはアホだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the fact that he hasn’t made a move on Miki-chan despite being this close—that part is dumb.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、では、記憶書換だ。今の健太郎のシーン、全部俺様にしろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, then rewrite the memories. Change all the scenes with Kentarou to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の感動的な記憶見て、よくそんな事言えるわね・・とワーグ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Warg says, 'After seeing those touching memories, you can say that...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、やってくれる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But he’ll do it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビジュアルの、健太郎がランスに書き換わる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the visuals, Kentarou is rewritten as Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過去シーンの一部、４．５台詞だけ再生。健太郎でなくランスが語り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Playback of a part of a past scene with about 4-5 lines. Rance speaks instead of Kentarou.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹がランス君と返事している感じの所を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the part where Miki responds to Rance-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で・・フェードアウト
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then... fade out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目が覚める・・美樹のランスを見る目が違う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She wakes up... Miki’s eyes when looking at Rance have changed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス君と甘えた感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is affectionate toward Rance-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに健太郎が現れる、どうしたの美樹ちゃん、そろそろ夕食の時間だよ、いこ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Kentarou appears. 'What’s wrong, Miki-chan? It’s almost dinner time, let’s go.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だれ、あなた、知らないと健太郎に向かって言う、ショックを受ける健太郎
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki says to Kentarou, 'Who are you? I don’t know you.' Kentarou is shocked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが美樹を部屋に連れて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance takes Miki to his room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして抱きしめる、えっ・・どうしたの、あわあわと慌てる美樹
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then he hugs her. 'Eh... what’s wrong?' Miki flusters and panics.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日、ぼくたちは結ばれよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, we shall be united.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、でも、それは元の世界に戻って、そうじゃなくて、二十歳になって結婚してからじゃないと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: B-but, that should be after we return to the original world, or rather, after I turn twenty and marry...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹は若干矛盾に混乱します、あれ・・ランス君は魔人になったのでは？とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki is somewhat confused by the contradiction, thinking, 'Wait... didn’t Rance-kun become a demon?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス君、彼女・・いっぱいいる？　王様なの、あれあれ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Does Rance-kun have a lot of girlfriends? He’s a king, isn’t he...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うまくいいくるめで抱きます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He manages to talk her into it and embraces her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 場所：ランスの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Location: Rance’s room

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞アイテム　剣を取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Item: Take the sword

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎と美樹がらぶらぶ歩いているシーンを見かける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He sees a scene where Kentarou and Miki are walking lovey-dovey.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見てランス君
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing that, Rance-kun thinks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹とどうしてもやりたい。魔王とエッチしたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I absolutely want to be with Miki. I want to have sex with the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが無理矢理は不可能
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But forcing her is impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の惚れ惚れテクニックを使っても無理
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even using my charming techniques won't work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんどかやったが、うまくいかなかった（過去回想ぽく入れるか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've tried several times but it didn’t go well (perhaps insert as a flashback).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎のようなアホが何故いいのか分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t understand why someone foolish like Kentarou is good for her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 側でジュースを飲んでいるワーグ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Warg is drinking juice nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの貪欲さにあきれる、エッチの為ならどんな努力もするのね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is exasperated at Rance’s greediness—he’ll do any effort just for sex.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当たり前だ、土下座でやれるのならしてやるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, if I have to grovel on my knees, I’ll do it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎君と美樹ちゃんは、思い出、絆、そういう深い物なので無理よ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentarou-kun and Miki-chan have memories, bonds, something deep like that, so it’s impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうね、ランスがその頃から美樹と出会っていたら恋仲になったかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s right, if Rance had met Miki back then, they might have become lovers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・そういや、ワーグ　お前は夢を見せる事が出来るんだよな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...By the way, Warg, you can show dreams, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の記憶のシーンに俺を介入させる事は出来るか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can you let me intervene in Miki’s memory scenes?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、あの子の過去の思い出、健太郎がいた場所に俺が入ればいいんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, if I enter the place in her past memories where Kentarou was.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・少し考える、出来るかも、でも他人の記憶にリンクするので危険かも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Thinking it over, maybe possible, but linking to another person's memory might be dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それにいいの魔王といっても知り合いの子の記憶を書き換える事になるよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, even though you’re the Demon King, rewriting the memories of someone you know is another matter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　手段は選ばない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > I won’t choose the means.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずは健太郎君に関する美樹を記憶を見るわね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First, I will view Miki’s memories about Kentarou-kun...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間にして３０分ほど・・ランスとワーグは二人の出会いから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 30 minutes in time... Rance and Warg watch from the two’s meeting

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今にいたるまでの出来事を美樹の記憶視点から覗いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: up to the present events from Miki’s memory perspective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・健太郎君、とってもいい子じゃない。悪人じゃないわ、一途で素敵
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Kentarou-kun is a really good guy. Not a bad person, earnest and wonderful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異世界（ランスからは）での生活、健太郎とは幼なじみ・・仲良し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Life in another world (from Rance’s view), Kentarou is his childhood friend... close friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ある日、異世界（私達の世界に）に掠われた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But one day, she was taken to another world (our world).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王になれて脅迫された怖かった美樹・・そして噛まれて魔王の血を入れられた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki was scared, forced to become Demon King and threatened... then bitten and infused with Demon King’s blood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分が徐々に変わっていく恐怖・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fear of gradually changing herself...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに健太郎が助けに来てくれた、うれしかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Kentarou came to help, which made her happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の記憶なので健太郎の活躍は描かれていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because these are Miki’s memories, Kentarou’s efforts aren’t detailed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ガイを倒し、美樹を助けにきた所だけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only the part where he defeated Demon King Gai and came to rescue Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この事については、ワードとランスの会話で表現
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is expressed through the conversation between Warg and Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎は楽した訳では無いんじゃない、知らないけど・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentarou probably didn’t have it easy, I don’t know for sure though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異世界から来て、苦労して、日光さんと出会って、いくつの試練を越えて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He came from another world, endured hardships, met Hikaru-san, and overcame many trials.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして魔王ガイを倒したの、ランスよりすごいんじゃないとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And thus defeated Demon King Gai—maybe even more impressive than Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この後も二人の物語は続いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After this, their story continued.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王になりかけ、再び囚われる美樹を取り戻す健太郎
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentarou retrieving Miki just as she was about to become the Demon King and was captured again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、アホな奴と思っていたが、なかなかやるじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I thought he was an idiot, but he’s actually quite capable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、これだけ一緒にいて美樹ちゃんに手を出してないなんて、そこはアホだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the fact that he hasn’t made a move on Miki-chan despite being this close—that part is dumb.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、では、記憶書換だ。今の健太郎のシーン、全部俺様にしろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, then rewrite the memories. Change all the scenes with Kentarou to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の感動的な記憶見て、よくそんな事言えるわね・・とワーグ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Warg says, 'After seeing those touching memories, you can say that...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、やってくれる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But he’ll do it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビジュアルの、健太郎がランスに書き換わる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the visuals, Kentarou is rewritten as Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過去シーンの一部、４．５台詞だけ再生。健太郎でなくランスが語り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Playback of a part of a past scene with about 4-5 lines. Rance speaks instead of Kentarou.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹がランス君と返事している感じの所を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the part where Miki responds to Rance-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で・・フェードアウト
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then... fade out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目が覚める・・美樹のランスを見る目が違う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She wakes up... Miki’s eyes when looking at Rance have changed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス君と甘えた感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is affectionate toward Rance-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに健太郎が現れる、どうしたの美樹ちゃん、そろそろ夕食の時間だよ、いこ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Kentarou appears. 'What’s wrong, Miki-chan? It’s almost dinner time, let’s go.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だれ、あなた、知らないと健太郎に向かって言う、ショックを受ける健太郎
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki says to Kentarou, 'Who are you? I don’t know you.' Kentarou is shocked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが美樹を部屋に連れて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance takes Miki to his room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして抱きしめる、えっ・・どうしたの、あわあわと慌てる美樹
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then he hugs her. 'Eh... what’s wrong?' Miki flusters and panics.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日、ぼくたちは結ばれよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, we shall be united.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、でも、それは元の世界に戻って、そうじゃなくて、二十歳になって結婚してからじゃないと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: B-but, that should be after we return to the original world, or rather, after I turn twenty and marry...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹は若干矛盾に混乱します、あれ・・ランス君は魔人になったのでは？とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki is somewhat confused by the contradiction, thinking, 'Wait... didn’t Rance-kun become a demon?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス君、彼女・・いっぱいいる？　王様なの、あれあれ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Does Rance-kun have a lot of girlfriends? He’s a king, isn’t he...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うまくいいくるめで抱きます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He manages to talk her into it and embraces her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 場所：ランスの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Location: Rance’s room
